name: 11eyes: Tsumi to Batsu to Aganai no Shoujo
summary: 11eyes is a Japanese adult visual novel.
1166 is a psychological horror game following six people in Salem, Massachusetts and how their lives change when one of them is kidnapped.

name: 11 Eyes: CrossOver
summary: 11 Eyes: CrossOver is a visual novel that expands on the story from the original game 11 Eyes.

name: 1193 Anno Domini: Merchants and Crusaders
summary:
1193 Anno Domini is a trading simulation set in the second half of the Middle Age. You are a little unknown trader. And so are your three rivals, which are either played by the computer or by real players. Now it's your task to become a rich and powerful merchant and over powering your three rivals. For this task, you have the ability to expand your business through 98 towns, while trading 36 different goods. But you are not just trading the goods, but you also producing them, for this task you have up to 22 production facilities to produce goods for 6 different economy sectors. For maintaining your trade business, you have to protect your goods from thieves or other players, but you must also counteract some external influences, like the weather or plagues.

When you gain influence as a trader and are respected by the authorities, they not just help you to protect your goods, but you also gain the ability to do some political decisions (taxation and others). You then also get assigned some tasks to do for the town and the church.

name: 11/2 Knights: In Search of the Ravishing Princess Herzelinde
summary: 1½ Knights: In Search of the Ravishing Princess Herzelinde (German: "1½ Ritter: Auf der Suche nach der hinreißenden Herzelinde") is a Point & Click adventure game, based on the German movie by the same name, developed by Daedalic Entertainment and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment.

name: 11wol Sonyeon
summary: A mystery-adventure game about an obsessive, stalker romance.

name: 11-11: Memories Retold
summary:
11th November 1916, a young photographer leaves Canada to join the western front in Europe.

The same day, a German technician is told that his son is missing in action.

Both want to preserve their humanity and come back alive to their loved ones.

name: 112 Operator
summary: Manage the emergency services in any city in the world! Take calls and dispatch rescue forces. Handle difficult situations, now depending on the weather, terrain and traffic. Help the citizens through cataclysms and natural disasters, becoming a better emergency number operator every day!

name: 11th Dream
summary: 11th Dream is fast-paced third person abstract shooter aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts. 11th includes both skirmish maps and campaign aimed at fast runners and hard-core difficulty enthusiasts. It is a game that you can try to beat while you render your video, waiting for the meeting or for a reply from your friend. Besides the solo-hardcore experience, 11th Dream delivers fully scrip-table in-game map editor, daily scoreboards to compete with other players and full on-line stats and leader-boards.

name: 1187: Episode One
summary: Creatures came out of what seemed to be thin air. Animated and alive. They came without a warning and swept the world...

name: 1187: Rogue Train
summary:
The world is not what it used to be, that much is clear. Whatever happened at Black Mesa is now affecting the entire globe. The ressonance cascade has reached the far ends of our planet which left humanity fighting for it's survival.
On this particular night however the dutch military finds itself having to deal with an abnormal high number of disturbances.
One of which involves an undercover military cargo train omitting radio transmissions.Heavily understaffed at this point they send in SlumDog, a veteran Black-Ops, to find out why the crew onboard is not responding.
1187 - Rogue Train takes place during the last few hours of 1187 - Episode One.

name: 11:45 A Vivid Life
summary: A short weird tale about a girl who discovered her skeleton isn't hers, stole an xray machine and fled to the country to investigate her own body.

name: 112th Seed
summary: In a future where Earth has become uninhabitable and food is so scarce that most of humanity has perished, take the role of a seed that could restore hope! Make your way through the last labs constructed to cultivate a plant species capable of surviving any environment. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, grow plants and find an exit in this casual yet challenging pixel art platformer.

name: 112 Operator: The Last Duty
summary: The time has come for your last duty. For how long can you protect your area? What threats await you? This semi-realistic DLC brings new exciting gameplay to the game.

name: 112 Operator: Water Operations
summary: New DLC Water Operations will extend your responsibility to rivers, lakes, and seas.

name: 112 Operator: Pandemic Outbreak
summary: New DLC will challenge you in the direst situation - the pandemic taking over your city.

name: 11.45 A Vivid Life
summary: A short weird tale about a girl who discovered her skeleton isn't hers, stole an xray machine and fled to the country to investigate her own body

name: 11 Islands 2: Story of Love
summary: Play the sequel of the charming Match3 game "11 Islands"... Team up with the tribe’s shaman and a ship captain to fight a magical fog and save the island’s inhabitants.

name: 1112: Episode 01
summary: 1112 invites players into the life of Louis Everett, an average man residing in the peaceful town of Jalonsville, New Jersey, with his curious wife. Despite his ordinary existence, Louis is troubled by constant headaches and mysterious dreams, leading players on a suspenseful journey to uncover hidden truths. In this game, you'll navigate through 15 detailed environments, interact with 8 distinct characters, and solve intriguing puzzles. The game's advanced graphics and original score create an immersive world, turning Louis's seemingly mundane life into a captivating, interactive mystery.

name: 1112: Episode 02
summary: In 1112 Episode 02, players continue the journey with Louis Everett, who now finds himself in New York under mysterious circumstances. This sequel amplifies the intrigue as players help Louis unravel the reasons behind his unexpected arrival in the bustling city. Promising unforeseen twists and encounters, the game offers hours of engaging gameplay. This episode elevates the experience with an all-new advanced graphical design and artistic direction, featuring 25 expansive and detailed environments. Players will meet 14 new characters, each adding to the rich tapestry of the story. The game's diverse puzzles, each with unique gameplay mechanics, challenge and engage players at every turn. Complemented by an original score, this installment of 1112 maintains its elaborate interactive narrative, immersing players deeper into Louis's increasingly complex world.

name: 1112: Episode 03
summary: In 1112 Episode 03, the enigmatic saga of Louis Everett continues as he mysteriously returns to Jalonsville via an enigmatic passageway. This installment deepens the intrigue, with Louis teetering on the brink of madness. Players are tasked with helping him cling to reality amidst escalating mysteries. This episode surpasses its predecessors in content, promising to keep players engrossed for hours with its complex storyline. The visual experience in this episode reaches new heights, with 39 stunningly realistic new backgrounds and 14 new characters enriching the narrative. The gameplay is enhanced with a variety of unique puzzles, each contributing to the unfolding mystery. The fluid and dynamic interfaces make for an engaging experience, complemented by original, captivating music. With a storyline more immersive and extensive than the first two episodes combined, 1112 Episode 03 offers a rich, spellbinding adventure that challenges both the mind and imagination.

Almost a decade after the black mesa incident which opened up the portal storms you find yourself trying to cope with its aftermath, creatures appeared which came out of what seemed to be thin air. They cam without warning and swept the world, it is during this time that you find yourself your apartment. Alone. For no apparent reason you\'ve been approached as in a dream by a man in a suit. Having no idea of what\'s going on all you can do is try to stay alive.

name: 11111Game
summary: Master addition in different bases. Slide tiles to add them, take advantage of overflow mechanic and game's grid.

name: 11 Hào Xiǎo Zhèn Zōng Hé Zhèng
11 Years Ago
summary: 11 Years Ago is a puzzle-solving single player adventure game made with Unreal Engine 5 and it is the final project of the Red 32 team of BigRock School.

name: 114 Miles to Doctor Noodles Farm
summary: A waiting-simulator story epilogue of Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner, the upcoming brand new game sequel of Baobabs Mausoleum. Published by Neon Doctrine.
1125899906842624 is a modified version of 2048 set in a 64x64 grid.

name: 11 Card Games
summary: It's game night in the house and what is more suitable for a social round than a well-maintained card game? After all, the game variants that make a 32-card stack possible, are almost immeasurable! But what if you feel like a well-groomed game, but neither teammates nor cards are in the house? What if you only have your Nintendo DS available instead? Do not worry, Rondomedia has an incredible solution for this incredible case! "11 card games" is the name of the miracle module, which in its memory not four, not seven, not nine, but an incredible 11 card games houses! What can go wrong in the face of this unexpected magnitude?

name: 1114: Robin Hood Survivors
summary: Help Robin Hood and his Merry Men to defeat Bad King John in a bullet heaven pixel adventure. 1114:Robin Hood Survivors is a casual, rogue-lite, top-down game where your choices are extremely important. Fight hundreds of forest enemies on screen at once.

name: 112 Reddings Helikopter
summary:
112 Reddings Helikopter is an action game that takes place in the cities of Amsterdam and Berlin. Completely remodeled to give the feeling of flying over the city in a helicopter. The player has a total of 20 missions to complete, these are dangerous missions with the ultimate goal to bring the person at risk to safety within a limited amount of time.

The fires, traffic accidents, chemical disasters, armed robbery, factory accidents, sudden heart attacks and rescues from tall buildings are some of the many situations that will occur.

name: 11F
summary: "I'll be waiting on the 11th floor." Until the moment you arrive

name: 11 Years
summary: 11 Years is a 3D marine survival game where you play as a Clownfish trying to survive from the direct and indirect human influences on the coral reef ecosystem. The player will experience phenomena such as ocean acidification, coral bleaching, ghost nets, and dead zones to see how each harmfully affects both the reef and its inhabitants. Through our educational narrative and various collectibles, we aim to educate players about the dire situation in our marine ecosystems. 11 Years intends to both contribute to the climate change dialogue as well as convey the experiences wildlife animals have to endure because of human impact.
Let's do some easy math with the girls!

name: 11 Doors: Escape From Prison
summary: Escape from 11 prison doors. When the player wakes up from sleep, he goes to the gym to do some exercise, then goes to the restaurant to boost his health, then goes to the factory to work, there you must make keys so you can escape.

name: 11th Hour Hero
summary: One hour. Infinite trials. Gather your friends, choose your powers, and prepare for a final battle to decide the fate of the world. 11th Hour Hero is a multiplayer roguelike FPS where every choice in a shifting, procedural ship determines whether you rise in glory, or fall into defeat.

name: 1111-Strike
summary: Tactical FPS where precision shooting meets role-based teamwork — pick Grand, Tank, Engineer, or Medic to combine aim, abilities, and proximity voice to outplay opponents in ranked, casual, or custom matches for up to 16 players.

name: 11 Trials of Raz
summary: A first-person observation game set in an endless loop. Spot subtle or deceptive anomalies, choose the right direction, and survive increasingly challenging and horrifying difficulty modes as you search for a way out.
